channel.title: PLEASE HELP PLEASE![pi]
channel.description: everytime i try to host my server for a friend to connect (been testing it for a while) we have tryd several times and everytime he connects he logs in for a split seccond then it disconnects my net? i have my firewall shut off in my router and computer and set up a static ip and all that good stuff PLEASE help i cannont find out why this is happening im fucking stumped ive done all the portforwarding correctly i have a static ip and i just cant figure this out :/ also i removed the packett dropper where it disconnects cheat clients already

item.title: PLEASE HELP PLEASE![pi]
item.dc:creator: @ta1nt3d ta1nt3d
item.description:
@ta1nt3d wrote:

yes and i have no clue why it keeps happening everytime i have someone connect where it be me connecting from my laptop or my friend from his computer they register with the server and as soon as they do it disconnects my ethernet

Read full topic
